title: Staff of Earth
summaries: The Staff of Earth is a Hardmode, post-Golem magic weapon which has a (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 14.29*1/7 (14.29%) / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 12.5*1/8 (12.5%) chance to be dropped by Golem. When used, it launches a Jungle Temple-style boulder that is affected by gravity, bounces off of tiles and rolls on the floor, and can pierce enemies five times before breaking upon the sixth hit. It continues damaging enemies on contact while it rolls on the ground. The boulder's base damage and knockback depend on its velocity (see details below).

statistics.Damage: 125 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 45 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) (Magic)
statistics.Mana: 18 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 17 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions)
statistics.Critical chance: 24% (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 4% (Old-gen console and 3DS versions)
statistics.Use time:
24 (Fast) (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) /
40 (Very slow) (Old-gen console and 3DS versions)
statistics.Sell: 7 GC
